title: ISic003248. I.Sicily inscription 003248
body:
Facsimile Images

[.Oc]tavius T(iti) f(ilius)[---]
[Co]rnelianus v[ixit]
[annis] XXII mens(ibus) I[..]
[T(itus)? Octavius?---] charmo[---]
5[et---]+Ṣpendu[sa]
[pare]ntes [fec(erunt) h(oc)] m(onumentum) s(ive) s(epulchrum) [---]

Apparatus criticus

Text from Korhonen 2004

English translation

Octavius Cornelianus, son of Titus, lived for 22 years and (?) months. Titus Octavius ... and Spendusa, the parents, made this. This monument or tomb ...

commentary

bibliography

  • 2004.0651 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001283
  • 114 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000028
